thread.section_title: Ibis Tour Eiffel Cambronne - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Nice Location
thread.title_full: Nice Location - Review of Ibis Tour Eiffel Cambronne, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: adexer
title: Nice Location
text: Stayed here for 2 night in February 2017. The location is great. Its near the Metro station and the Eiffel Tower. Unfortunately, our rooms didn't get a view of the Eiffel Tower. The room was clean, but the bathrooms space was quite small. Staff were kind and the restaurant was pretty good. I would recommend this ibis hotel.
